node.title: Trevor Noah: ‘Covid Turned the Planet Into a Frat House’
node.alt: “Yes, it’s all the greatest hits in one place, like if ‘Mamma Mia’ killed you instead of teaching you about the power of love,” Noah joked of Omicron’s mutations on Monday night.
node.description: The latest Covid variant, Omicron, follows Alpha, Lambda and Delta in the Greek alphabet.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "Trevor Noah dug into the new Covid variant on Monday night, touching on Omicron\u2019s disturbingly high number of mutations, which make it potentially more dangerous than the others.", "\u201cYes, it\u2019s all the greatest hits in one place, like if \u2018Mamma Mia\u2019 killed you instead of teaching you about the power of love,\u201d Noah joked on Monday night.", "Stephen Colbert demands more Hanukkah-themed holiday films like \u201cA Whole Latke Love.\u201d", "Maya Rudolph will surely get roped into something fun with her pal Jimmy Fallon on Tuesday\u2019s \u201cTonight Show.\u201d", "After 14 years, Justin Vivian Bond and Kenny Mellman are resurrecting Kiki and Herb for Christmas."]
